title: Ep. - 556 - DIRECTOR OF GOD FORBID: THE SEX SCANDAL THAT BROUGHT DOWN A DYNASTY, BILLY CORBEN
description:
Billy Corben, Director of the Hulu Original Documentary ‘God Forbid: The Sex Scandal that Brought Down a Dynasty. In this revealing documentary, Giancarlo Granda, former pool attendant at the Fontainebleau Hotel, shares the intimate details of his 7-year relationship with a charming older woman, Becki Falwell, and her husband, the Evangelical Trump stalwart Jerry Falwell Jr. The scandal ultimately forced Falwell to resign from his position as president of Liberty University, the Evangelical University established by his father. 

 

Kate discusses A Tree of Life: The Pittsburgh Synagogue Shooting on HBO.

 

Reality Life with Kate Casey

Patreon: http://www.patreon.com/katecasey
